message.title: Synaxis Investment
message.description: We are committed not only to providing high-quality products and services, but also to going above and beyond to ensure complete customer satisfaction.

services_section.title: Our Services
services_section.subtitle: Let's know about
services_section.description: We provide innovative and high-quality construction services to enhance urban development and support national projects.

real_estate.title: Real Estate
real_estate.description: We offer comprehensive real estate marketing services, finishing solutions for developers, and engineering consultations.

constructions.title: Constructions
constructions.description: From building urban cities to developing new industrial zones, we aim to create sustainable and modern infrastructures.

events.title: Events & Advertising
events.description: We specialize in organizing exhibitions, conferences, and promotional campaigns to support business growth and networking.

properties_list.title: Available Properties

WHO_WE_ARE.TITLE: Who We Are
WHO_WE_ARE.CONTENT: The roots of Synaxis Company and its main headquarters go back to the Emirate of Abu Dhabi after the success of engineer Mohamed Kamal in the Arab Gulf countries through project management and general contracting, which led to gaining experience through the implementation of approximately 60 projects inside and outside Egypt for a period exceeding 20 years. Here, plans were made and the foundation stone was laid to establish the Synaxis entity inside Egypt in order to complete the journey of success within Egypt and provide a high level of services.

OUR_VISION.TITLE: Our Vision
OUR_VISION.CONTENT: Synaxis Company aspires to be the first and even the largest business leader in the region and at the level of the Middle East, through planned businesses and partnerships with both the private and government sectors. It also aspires to raise the employment rate and raise the level of efficiency, experience and work standards, in addition to contributing with the government and the private sector. And businessmen to move forward with our investments in all sectors and achieve profits together.

form.title: Title

form.descriptionError: Description is required and must be at least 20 characters long.

form.phoneError: Phone number is required and must be between 10-15 digits.

fileErrors.fileCount: You can upload up to 5 files only.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: We are here to help you. Reach out to us through the form or use the contact details below. Our team is ready to assist with any inquiries or feedback, and we will respond as quickly as possible to meet your needs.
CONTACT.FORM_SUBTITLE: Fill the fields below, and our expert team will contact you to evaluate your property for free.

ERRORS.NAME_MINLENGTH: Name must be at least 3 characters long.
ERRORS.MESSAGE_MINLENGTH: Your message must be at least 10 characters long.
